name: S_P_R
description: A simple platform game with 25 challenging levels, in addition to 5 boss battles, having traditional game mechanics of the genre and mouse aiming system usable on specific occasions. The last levels are procedurally generated. Have fun with this short game.   Note: The game has status improvements depending on the total score acquired by the player.  Note 2: Still under development, improvements will be applied over time.
